Posts.Content: Hello everyone, while helping my friend through breast cancer treatment we did all the normal fundraising activities, but i decided to do something a bit different, with the help of a good friend we set up our own website, offering information on everything to do with breastcancer including alternative treatments, what i am looking for is some feedback on the site, so if you could spare a few moments to have a good look around, and leave some comments i would be most gratefull, thankyou http://www.breastcancersearch.info
Posts.Title: breast cancer information

Posts.Content: seanty, What a horrible man you are, iam in no way trying to misinform or swindle anybody, the articles on the site are submitted by qualified and experienced people, just because you dont agree with them does not make them rubbish, you are very blinkered in my view and left to people like you we would still be in the dark ages.
Posts.Title: breast cancer information
